website_summaries.verdict: The VuPoint Solutions Magic Wand With AutoFeed Dock (PDSDK-ST470-VP) is both a highly portable wand scanner and, when mounted in its dock, a manual-feed scanner, too.
pros: Works as both wand scanner by itself and as a manual-feed scanner with its dock
cons: Comes without required microSD memory card

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this so I could do larger photos and hopefully get better quality. A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I scanned a few pictures and they were dark and the colors over saturated. I tried the white calibration that is listed as the solution to this problem, but it didn't seem to help. I am considering returning this, especially when I compare the results from this scanner to the results of a small, cheaper scanner I had. The old scanner is limited to 4x6 and is only 300 dpi. I purchased this so I could do larger photos and hopefully get better quality. A bit disappointed. This is a pic - left is from this scanner, right is from the cheaper scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I’m sad that I got a chance to try it now, almost 2 months after purchasing it. And also that doing all the paperwork at work to explain why I’ll return this is so much work that I rather dump it. In short, this is overpriced garbage. Portability as expected so is good there. But why would that matter if: 1) scanning quality in JPG and PDF sucks. I have an old one from other manufacturer and its lower DPI beats this one for a mile!!! 2) Am I supposed to use the auto feed dock as a paper weight???!!! If it doesn’t feed the paper what’s the use of it!!!??? VuPoint = overprice garbage
customer_reviews.author: Wilberto Alamo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it and wanted it to work great, but I couldn't get it to feed the paper through when it was docked and then the scan would always produce an error when I used the wand by itself. I didn't bother calling tech support and just returned it. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Great for digitizing genealogy records
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to simplify digitizing and organizing my genealogy photos and records. It is very easy to scan a batch and upload them to Dropbox where I can permanently store them and transfer them to Ancestry.com. I look forward to using the detached scanner wand to image delicate documents and public documents that are often stored in bound books.
customer_reviews.author: NancyS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with microSD card and won't function with out a compatible one.
customer_reviews.text: I almost rated "it's okay" but felt it had too many problems to give it the benefit of the doubt. First, it doesn't do anything unless you have a microSD card in it, and that's not included. It's not a scanner when you plug it into your computer, it's just an expensive microSD reader (or being charged). It partially works with SDXC cards but stops working and doesn't display any errors. Just scans, and continues on without saving If you rename any scan files on the card, it will stop saving scans without error. If you delete a file on the card leaving a break in the serial # of the filenames, it will stop saving scans without error.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: W O W So Easy And Gave Us Peace Of Mind With Our Pictures ! ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: In just a few hours over two days we scanned 2000 photos that now are backed up and safe which gave us incredible peace of mind! Super simple to use.. will do high med or low level of photos in either jpg or pdf... we did the bulk in med and jpg for our needs... again W O W was well worth the money for this device for our backing up of family photos!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mark Loewenberg

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My daughter and son-in-law have this. When I watched them use it I decided right then to get one to tame the piles of receipts my husband seems to collect. This is SO easy to use! It is truly plug and play. We have a Mac computer and there was no issue at all. It does not come with a micro SD card that is needed. Other than that, it is a fantastic tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and great images!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for Family History, for pictures and documents, etc. I love that you can run it through on the base or remove it and scan it manually, as some of those photos and documents were very old and brittle and I did not feel comfortable running it through automatically. I am not a very "tech-savvy" person, but I had no problem figuring it out. The images come out crisp and clean. I absolutely love this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Stamp

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: After using this wand numerous times now to scan both text and images to digitize family genealogy, I can report that it has served me well. Quality of material/build is very solid/good. The battery life is more than satisfactory. The ability to vary image quality is simple and effective. The scans I've done were mostly by hand (without the bridge) and mostly images. It took a little practice, but the results were good enough to use right away. A real sleeper in this package is the OCR software; it took awhile to load but really does the job of converting imaged or pdf text to an editable state. I would recommend these products to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Not for Mac Users
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase if you have a Mac. It does not easily connect, it is a pain to work with, and there are better options for your money. I returned it immediately- for the price it should be a simple connection process.
customer_reviews.author: Runner19

customer_reviews.title: yes and no
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job but wish it was wider. Hard to get the wand into the crease of a book far enough to scan the width of the page without breaking the binding to lay the book flat. But it makes great images, it picks up pencil without a problem, high quality PDF or JPeg. Would be nice to have one that would scan bigger things.
customer_reviews.author: MPS

customer_reviews.title: What I don't like is that you can't scan directly to a computer
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is handy, lightweight, battery has a life time acceptable. What I don't like is that you can't scan directly to a computer, it scans memory to SD and then have to connect the USB cable to the computer to download the documents.
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner with some hickups.
customer_reviews.text: It works great 85% of the time, I have the docking station also and I carry it in my training bag, as I have to scan attendance sheets. The scanner works great, the only issue is that about every 8 - 12 sheets it will then only scan a half sheet and one just has to watch the little screen, and when this happens just rescan the one missed page again. Other than this it is a good scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Schuerman

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Includes all the original contents: Scanner, dock, USB cord, AC adapter, Manual & Quick Start Guide, pouch for scanner, cleaning cloth for scanner window, white balance calibration card, But you got to buy you own microSD memorycard.It has been used, but is in very good condition and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use, but poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient object bought for scanning thousands of familly pictures, but... picture quality is really poor: - images are a little blurred. It could be improved with computer post treatment, but it's a very cumbersome process. - vertical lines appear on EVERY scanned picture, even after cleaning the lens and calibrating white balance with the provided reference white sheet. Many times! Finally, I stopped using it and made scans with my multifunction printer. Harder and longer, but much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: BEAUSOLEIL

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I started using this. It seemed so easy to use. But after three-four pictures were scanned, I started noticing red and white streaks. I cleaned the glass and scanned three-four more photos and the streaks came back again. I hit the button for tech support and was told I could try to go through the warranty company (I bought the extended warranty). They told me that the manufacturers warranty was still in effect. I tried calling the manufacturer- I left a message and still haven’t heard anything. So I bought the scanner, warranty, and the hardshell carrying case. And all I’m hoping for is a refund from someone. So frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Good Price, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy portable wand scanner. A steady hand is needed to get clear images the more you use this wand scanner the better you get at it. Great tool for researchers and students.
customer_reviews.author: Liu

customer_reviews.title: Nice little item
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this off and on for a month or so. It sits on my desk taking up very little room and when I have a minute or two, I scan family photos and then put them on my computer. So far I have only used it for pictures because I have another device for scanning PDFs. I would recommend it to others. BTW: this was an open box purchase, so I saved a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Canary formerly in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Well worth what we paid and worked better than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: We had many photos from our 49 years together and before that were in boxes in the attic. We thought it would be a huge task to scan some of these into the computer. How wrong we were! Not only was it fun to take a "trip down memory lane" but it was so easy to scan over 2000 of our memories into the computer. Now we can share our memories with friends and they are on the computer, to view whenever we want. The Magic Wand worked better than anticipated. It was easy, fast and the pictures look amazing. Well worth what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality scans - just be sure to keep it clean
customer_reviews.text: Scanned over 3000 pictures the weekend I got this and I absolutely love it. I will caution when scanning old pictures I would recommend wiping the scanner with the cleaning cloth every 100 pictures or so - as we progressed through the pictures, lines became more and more apparent on the scans. You can see in the files where we had wiped the scanner down because the lines disappeared. This is just a learning though and not a negative on the scanner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Relacement works as ecpected
customer_reviews.text: The first Magic Wand received could not connect to computer, hard to feed photos through, and resulted in grainy, dotted, lined images. The replacement works as expected and images are so much better. Customer Service was awesome. Now I can get all those papered photos on a digital source.
customer_reviews.author: acferran

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 star because...
customer_reviews.text: I had to go out of my way and buy a 32GB Micro SD card, since this portable scanner will not support SD cards higher than that. (I have 2 128GB micro SD cards, really didn't want to buy another 32GB one...) Other than that, this scanner is extremely easy to use. Just follow the instructions that came with it and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pascoe

customer_reviews.title: this is a great scanner dont hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner i have scanned so far over 300 photos in 2 weeks. If you are in to saving photos and preserving them digitally this is the way to go. I am really into genealogy and this helps me be able to scan things fast and simple. I take this everywhere i go. If you go to a library its nice to have so you can scan things they may have as well. the screen is a good size as well.
customer_reviews.author: leaann

customer_reviews.title: like how easily and quickly I could scan 8x10 photos
customer_reviews.text: Portable scanner, like how easily and quickly I could scan 8x10 photos. Also liked that I can take the scanner apart and scan magazine page. Simple and easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Bokoski

customer_reviews.title: The best way to describe the Magic Wand is "slick"
customer_reviews.text: I needed to copy some maps and photos from a library book on a computer modeling project. The best way to describe the Magic Wand is "slick". Set up directions were easy to understand. And on my first attempt, all of the maps and photos I needed were easily scanned. Have not yet tried the docking system, but feel confident that it will work as well. Would recommend the product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected. So far have used it to scan pages from a borrowed cookbook. I like that it scans both in PDF and jpeg file types. Haven't tried it docked yet. Delivery came on day indicated. I really like the portability of the unit. Am not restricted to the location of my printer / scanner.
customer_reviews.author: EdieN

customer_reviews.title: No computer necessary
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my purpose. I use the handheld scanner for handwritten notes, magazine articles, newspaper articles, fabric patterns, oversized documents etc. I've also used the dock to scan photographs, which it did a decent job with. I purchased another micro SD for receipts, invoices, etc. for tax purposes. This way I don't have to waste time looking at these documents since I will only need them at tax time or if someone asks for it. Periodically I upload the files into Evernote which will make them searchable (OCR).
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Overall I would definitely recommend this product for what it does but don't expect ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave an average review because it's an average product but it is just as they described it. You get quite a few errors when using just the wand and I work on the road so I often brings us to bond with me to quickly scan documents. When using the docking station and feeding documents in there are rarely errors. Overall I would definitely recommend this product for what it does but don't expect something that you can whip out & run across the document and get a perfect scan that you can email without any trouble, it takes a little bit of doing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good, if it's enough for you
customer_reviews.text: When one gets used to the stellar performance of the best stationary scanners, with the many automatic corrections and adjustments that come with their software, it's kind of hard to bear with iffy, shaky outputs of even the best, most expensive portables.
customer_reviews.author: User G

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful scanner. It works just as stated
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful scanner. It works just as stated. The directions are very good and should be read before you stumble into the operation. I am a man and as usual I didn't really read the directions before I started using it. You will probably need an USB extender cable if you leave the scanner connected to the computer all the time. The dock works great and the copy quality is excellent. It will accept fairly thick items like a drivers license.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This has been a real workhorse in our museum, scanning hundreds of pages of handwritten notes with great ease.
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: small and sturdy. Why three starts then
customer_reviews.text: The hardware (device) it's self is 5 star. Simple, small and sturdy. Why three starts then? The knock off software is awful. 70% 30% for compatibility for adobe flash/reader/publisher and the same for Windows Notes. Tried other scanners and had no such problems.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how well this works. Very easy to use and very high quality scans.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinian

customer_reviews.title: and with better features, such as removable wand and one button ...
customer_reviews.text: As a doxie replacement, significantly cheaper than doxie, and with better features, such as removable wand and one button to switch from scan to card to usb stick for your PC.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is AMAZING. It is easy to use and doesn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is AMAZING. It is easy to use and doesn't take a lot of time to set up. You can detach it from the unit and use as a wand or insert pictures/documents right into the device.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: Wand works great. Dock doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Wand seems to work fine, but it is not charging via Dock. Once the wand is charged directly, the dock works, but if you plug power to dock, wand does not charge. I thought it was by design, but then I read that wand supposed to charge via dock. Missed my return window and now stuck with bad dock. Double check that the dock is indeed charging the wand.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Fast, convenient, but not great quality scans.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is fast and convenient as you don't have to use a computer. It scans directly to an SD card. But the scans are kinda dark and there was a white line (or in some cases, multiple white lines) that appeared on the scans. Need something that takes more color accurate scans so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner.
customer_reviews.text: I have scanned more than 3000 pictures and newspaper articles. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, very portable without docking station. Scan quality is great for what i use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. I wanted to copy a lot of old family photos and some of mine for safe keeping. This was awesome and easy to use. The little picture window is helpful and I was allowed to rotate and resize when I was done. I was not worried about my hand shaking it was pretty sturdy. I liked the docking station too it was easy to use as well. a must have
customer_reviews.author: Tee Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great gift or self gift
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have bought a better gift for myself or anyone else. Good for travel, portable research storage, reunions for copying pictures, documents, etc. The list just goes on and on that I have utilized this for.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyTMac

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price and the concept and look forward to scanning the hundreds of pictures I've been putting off. It would have been nice to have some men6tion of working with scanned files in the documentation but it was fairly simple once I used it. I'm guessing the reader software is some kind of OCR app. One odd thing is the USB cable. It woks fine for charging the unit but does not work when connecting to my computer. I swapped it for a different one and the display immediately changed to the USB icon and was accessible from Windows.
customer_reviews.author: C. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Scanned 6000 pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Scanned 6000 pictures! It is tricky and have to clean the glass about every 5 or so pictures to minimize streaking. If you want extreme quality get a flatbed. But scanning all my pictures from my entire life and all just mostly snapshots, it was perfect, fast and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner, great selling company.
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent! I bought the refurbished unit, and it seems like a brand new unit. OCR software (for Windows only) was included. Nothing but praise for a product that works as advertised. Scanning using the docking station is incredibly easy and quick. Out of the docking station, only three or four tries were needed before I felt like it was easy and accurate. Glad I bought from these folks!
customer_reviews.author: Carlton A Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner with excellent portability
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this portable scanner to replace one damaged on my last trip. Produces great scans when you don't have access to a flat-bed scanner.
customer_reviews.author: SKI49

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy and fun to use. Time saver.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. Very easy to use. Takes excellent copies. Much easier than having to lift a lid, place a picture and so on. You either scan with the hand held part and drag it along or put it in the base and feed the pictures one after another. Done in no time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gengler

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I brought it to clear out paper
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I brought it to clear out paper. Its small and doesn't have to be hook up to the computer. I just unpack my stuff scan the receipts I need for taxes and throw them away, no more paper. I am slowly going through the previous years files and scanning them to a USB stick. I wish it would do multiple pages to 1file.
customer_reviews.author: Burgundy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get's The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I was using a scanner from another manufacturer and it kept skipping scans which you didnt realize until you had to transfer them to the computer. This VuPoint scanner worked every time, is easy to use. Most of my sans so far have been with the dock scanning old photos. But I also like the wand feature to scan items which cant be fed through the slot.
customer_reviews.author: tfc10r

customer_reviews.title: great product, but I have 2 frustrations:
customer_reviews.text: great product, but I have 2 frustrations: 1. the bonus software is not compatible with macs. I wanted something that would be able to ocr and auto-deskew and auto-crop the border. merg. 2. I thought the dock would fix this problem. It is nice. Although, i starts scanning before you've had the chance to really make sure the paper's going in straight. If you adjust it while its going, you end up with black smudges on the scan. Also, dock scanning leaves a white border around the outside of the scan. wish i could turn that off.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: I believe that is a fantastic product: mainly because of the high resolution
customer_reviews.text: Vupoint Solutions Magic Wand Portable Scanner with Color LCD Display and an Auto-Feed the Dock is the third skener in my practice. The first two products is from IRIS company. I believe that is a fantastic product: mainly because of the high resolution. Work with scanner comfortably and quickly. Still I would like to note that the very precise and well written user manual: short and understandable. A pleasant surprise in package is CD with ABBYY Fine Reader 10.
customer_reviews.author: Juris

customer_reviews.title: Scans are streaked
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to set up and use but the scans of the photos have several streaks down them, even on the first day after cleaning and reading instructions. I think this is great for scanning receipts quickly, but NOT for photos
customer_reviews.author: JuMarCh

customer_reviews.title: pretty much as described
customer_reviews.text: pretty much as described. takes a little time to adjust to using the hand wand, and fails sometime so you have to scan twice. I am happy with it so far but have only used is few times, I will be happy if it continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Stauss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic scanner and improved over the first one. Larger view screen and adaptable dock for auto scanning. This item will scan anything true to form and you can take it anywhere..
customer_reviews.author: Clubowner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is SO useful and easy to use. It's space saving and easily transportable. Great little scanner!
customer_reviews.author: Kat1234

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was up and scanning within 10 minutes of receiving the package. Stored it straight to the card. Great product! Glad I added the auto-feed dock!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshineray

customer_reviews.title: Feeder doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Pleas do waste your money on this. Took it out of the box, set it up and the scanner works but the auto feeder doesn’t. Very disappointed that I’m going to have to rerun this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allen

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to use, however, every 15ish photos you feed through, you have to take the wand off and wipe off the dust or else you'll get streaks. Small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Scanning base continues to run sometimes. Have to remove ...
customer_reviews.text: Scanning base continues to run sometimes. Have to remove unit and reboot to start the scanning process again. Have gotten the white lines reported by others, just have to clean and rescan. Have scanned over 1400 pictures so far.......
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife... Happy life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, from what I heard she was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Works great but have only used it for about 6 hours total. No support or interface use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Hawpe

customer_reviews.title: A great scanner
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is flexible and quality. It will scan as a wand, or when docked it is easy to pass documents or photos thru it. The quality of the scan is high as well. I'm using this to scan all the old family photos.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is the best scanner ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scanner ever!!! 547 photos so far and going strong. It’s the best invention. Love it!!! Making our job of consolidating photo prints for our daughter much easier.
customer_reviews.author: C Haaker

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, although it will take some use to become proficient in using it as a handheld device. My first attempt was erratic but still resulted in a legible copy of text. I suspect images would take more proficiency, but no I have no doubt that this is a handy product.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E. Mus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use. I can even the smallest pictures. The picture quality is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to scan my coloring books and other documents for easy access. I have been using this a lot. I will buy again if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for photos
customer_reviews.text: The VuPoint scanner may be great for documents but I ordered it for a faster means of quickly digitizing a mass of photos into my computer. It does the job but not with quality, lots of streaking on every photo no matter what the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Scanned over 100 pictures in less than an hour!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! At first I got the "Full" error that other people had, but it was my error that I used a micro SD card that was greater than 32 gb.... I would not hesitate to purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I've been looking for. While watching football game I ran over 300 photos through it. Quality was excellent. Very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: The scanner is ideal for all features... ...
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is ideal for all features....It is portable, lightweight, dual function. I can scan very long documents that my ordinary printer can't scan. All my receipts, warranties, contracts, product information, bills, notes, and more....all go in the shredder after scanning now, and my life is more paperless.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Co

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to archive family pictures on a trip to some relatives. It's totally unreliable. Bad crops and many times the auto feeder wouldn't sense a picture. Unless you have the time to check every scan before moving on, I'd suggest finding a different scanner.
customer_reviews.author: vandeh2o

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this over anything comparable
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a couple years now under harsh conditions with not a single burp. I would recommend this over anything comparable. Software was a plus.

customer_reviews.title: I love this scanner
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this scanner. The auto feed dock works great and is so fast.

customer_reviews.title: Poor scan quality

Like all new equipment today, phones that take good pictures and so on. I do not recommend it only if you need more convenience than quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fodor

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use, and worked great for archiving old family photos into a digital format. Way better than working with older mediums, like film. This is a great item for overall moving to a paperless environment, whether it be home or office. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Grace

customer_reviews.title: So great! It's so easy to run the scanner over ...
customer_reviews.text: So great! It's so easy to run the scanner over whatever you've got if it's flat enough. The feeder helps with old curled up photos.

customer_reviews.title: oky but sensitive feed
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work on windows 10. I even tried their website but could not find drivers. When I tried it to scan to the card, it worked but very hard to get pages straight with page feed system.
customer_reviews.author: Dependable

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product with a plethora of applications not tackled as ...
